question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.


A friend of yours is thinking of going on a camping holiday for the first time this summer. He/she has asked for your advice.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,


explain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holiday
describe some possible disadvantages
say whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summer
Write at least 150 words.
text: I hope this letter finds you well and I would like to give you the advice you requested  regarding your camping holiday  this summer. I know,  this will be a lifetime memory and you may have great fun during this trip as you guys are going as a team from the college.

This will be your's first trip and I would ask you to be more careful while camping in the deep forest as there will not be any mobile network if anything happened and then you have to think and take action accordingly. Do not think about proper food and water and you must carry everything on your shoulders which may be a huge pain. I am not sure about maps and directions which may be new to everyone and please take a note of your foot movements while going to unknown places.

In fact, I would like to join you during this trip, but unfortunately, I  cannot make it plan this time as I need to attend my office meeting which is very much important due to the year-end close activities. I will be available  in the third week of next month and also we can  have more fun as there will be more daylight and without any rain.
I cannot wait to go there and make a good trip this summer.
